item.title: Nginx force SSL
SSL and Homestead
item.description: This is like most nginx the only trick was adding the port forward on Homestead #scripts/homestead.rb # Configure Port Forwarding To The Box config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 80, host: 8000 config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 443, host: 44300 config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 3306, host: 33060 config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 5432, host: 54320 config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 11300, host: 11300 I set it to 44300 Then just follow along here http://laravel.io/forum/07-06-2014-enabling-ssl-on-a-homestead-vm which leads to here https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-create-a-ssl-certificate-on-nginx-for-ubuntu-12-04 for the rest
